exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply Nat.lt_trans with (m := S(loop x n)).
exceptions.exn: The reference n was not found in the current environment.

original: intros x H. induction H. - apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r. - simpl. apply Nat.lt_trans with (m := S(loop x n)). + apply IHle. + apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r.
